title: AP Kog is the dumbest champion at the moment. Is Rito serious?
body:
-Against Kog
-Picks Ahri to bully since Zed and LB were banned
-Stomp lane killing him twice and finishing lane around 15-20 cs up
-Kog gets 11 and Luden's 
-Not exaggerating starts one shotting **everyone**

It's so dumb when a champion can fall so far behind in lane, reach one power spike and no joke start LB bursting everyone from Xerath range, like that description right there is actually really accurate... It's really disheartening when you tried your damnedest to keep a champion down and actually did that well but somehow that dude just comes out on top

replies.body:
>Not exaggerating starts one shotting **everyone**

This is called exaggerating.
No as in a Q,E,R **literally** one shotted my Thresh... Like literally 100%
This is why you play Quinn.
lmao

Just saw AP Kog'Maw played by SKT T1 Faker in the mid lane.
Easy wins with an OP Gragas Jungle.
Its nuts dude
lol hes still the least played adc hahaha, maybe not now after incarnation played him though
Heard of ziggs,azir,karthus.
Dis guy has more range, and scales way harder

> [{quoted}](name=Olee,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ffcfkwab,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-06-01T10:50:23.532+0000)
>
> Dis guy has more range, and scales way harder

he scales way harder yes,  he is super shit early you get fed early from him then pwn if you cant do that gtfo
I did get fed early... I started the game of 2/0 from him and and went for a bot lane roam and ended up 4/0. But when he hit 11+Luden's he just got super fed from everyone

> [{quoted}](name=Olee,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ffcfkwab,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-06-01T11:17:06.426+0000)
>
> I did get fed early... I started the game of 2/0 from him and and went for a bot lane roam and ended up 4/0. But when he hit 11+Luden's he just got super fed from everyone

So you dont know how to play vs him?
So what did I do wrong then sir?

> [{quoted}](name=Olee,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ffcfkwab,comment-id=000100000000000000000001,timestamp=2015-06-01T21:04:06.826+0000)
>
> So what did I do wrong then sir?

You died alot, your cs wasnt great (his was fine for how he raped you and/or your team) etc. That is not a personal attack its what you asked, im s5 myself (havent played ranked i a long time)
EDIT: You didnt kill him early pretty much , died to him early-mid game then to cho and others.

Yeah I died when he started one shotting me... And yeah my cs has never been great... I've been working on it and that's actually really good for me... So that one's a given.

I did kill him early... That shit doesn't show up in end game stats... Xin ganked once and blew flash so I continued to kill him twice in in lane. I denied him as much cs as I possibly could he could only farm with ult at one point and I was up about 20 cs. And no I only died like once or something before 20 mins...

You were playing {{champion:103}} right? 
You should be deleting {{champion:96}} all game.
You can dodge all of his skillshots with your ult, and charm him when they're all on CD.
The only reason that you wouldn't be able to render Kog'Maw useless is if the enemy jungler camped your lane.
They had a really strong front line. Was never able to get near him
Well I guess that comes down to team performance. Your team was either not co-ordinated enough to focus targets or your whole team was at a disadvantage when everyone locked in their champions.

> [{quoted}](name=Olee,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ffcfkwab,comment-id=00010000000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2015-06-02T02:29:25.845+0000)
>
> Yeah I died when he started one shotting me... And yeah my cs has never been great... I've been working on it and that's actually really good for me... So that one's a given.
> 
> I did kill him early... That shit doesn't show up in end game stats... Xin ganked once and blew flash so I continued to kill him twice in in lane. I denied him as much cs as I possibly could he could only farm with ult at one point and I was up about 20 cs. And no I only died like once or something before 20 mins...

You died 3 times before 20 minutes
My mistake

> [{quoted}](name=ShuffledPancake,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ffcfkwab,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-06-01T11:23:19.763+0000)
>
> So you dont know how to play vs him?

Gank, blow his summoners, rinse and repeat until you have his mid lane turret before he gets yours. Nowhere to hide now for furry animal )

Lel I did all of this, except with no ganks because Xin said he couldn't find a way in so I had to solo him which I knew I could since Ahri v Kog but he just came out of laning phase ready to suck everyone off anyway
16/6/12 doesn't look like you stomped him lmao
i killed him three times in lane and denied him cs until he was about 30 down for a whiiile. He literally had to ONLY farm with Living Artillery.
And the largest killing spree was 6, by kogmaw, so his score at minimum before that was 10/6, and that isn't stomped.
